scripts.cy:run:all: npm run cy:run:first && npm run cy:run:second
scripts.cy:record:parallel: npm run cy:run:first -- --group Test1 --ci-build-id 2 --record --key b3cf452f-fc5e-4c06-9bec-8d33cd6fb80e --parallel & npm run cy:run:second -- --group Test2 --ci-build-id 2 --record --key b3cf452f-fc5e-4c06-9bec-8d33cd6fb80e --parallel
scripts.cy:report: rm -rf allure-results && npx cypress run && npx allure serve allure-results
